eventsDataJson.eventName: Research and development in Agrochemical sector.
eventsDataJson.description: It's an virtual industrial visit, in one of the biggest R&D centers of Gujarat named Meghmani organics limited. Dr Bhavesh Vyas will address the talk and will make you go through it's Agrochemical sector. Main agenda to be talked on are discovery, development, evolution & trails, scale up, regulatory and manufacturing.
